settings.heading: ET40 & ET45 Docks & Mounts
settings.copy: To conquer everyday tasks like inventory management, proof of pickup and delivery, or mobile point of sale, RAM® Mounts rugged mounts, docking solutions and peripherals enable Zebra's new ET40 & ET45 rugged enterprise tablets for field use. These docks come with many different options to keep your device connected to power and have the ability to add peripherals to your solution such as scanners, printers, speakers and more. Pair with any modular RAM® Mounts components to create a custom mount for your specific needs.

settings.heading: Locking & Non-Locking Options
settings.copy: Each of these docks for the Zebra ET40 & ET45 are available in non-locking, or with an integrated tubular key-locking system with two keys provided. In addition to optimal charging and mounting, these docks also offer the option of security & theft deterrence.

settings.heading: Built for Zebra Accessories
settings.copy: Zebra offers quality ergonomic and power accessories for their rugged tablets, including the new ET40 and ET45. The RAM® Tough-Dock™ docks are designed to accommodate those accessories with additional space in the back, all while maintaining a lower-profile and lightweight build. Attach a Zebra Expansion back to your new ET40 or ET45 with confidence.

settings.heading: Zebra ET40/ET45 + GDS® Tech™
settings.copy: Ruggedizing everyday tasks like inventory management, proof of pickup and delivery, or mobile point of sale just became easier. With GDS® Tech™ docking solutions and IntelliSkin® case system, Zebra's new ET40 & ET45 rugged tablets can stay connected and protected. These docks and skins come with pogo pin technology to keep your device connected to power and have the ability to add peripherals while protecting the devices' ports. This standardized connectivity unlocks the GDS® Ecosystem™ of products for a seamless workflow.

settings.heading: GDS® Ecosystem™
settings.copy: The GDS® Ecosystem™ offers everything to keep your ET40 & ET45 protected, connected, and charged in nearly any application. Ruggedized GDS® Technology™ pogo pins ensure compatibility across various GDS® Tech™ products as long as your ET40 or ET45 is wrapped in an IntelliSkin® protective sleeve. Explore many options in the GDS® Ecosystem™ such as GDS® Docks™, adapters, chargers, keyboards, speakers, monitors, and more.
